aka: The Naked King: 18 Fragments about Revolution

cast.name: 亚采克·彼得雷茨基 Jacek Petrycki
法拉赫·巴列维 Empress Farah
穆罕默德·礼萨·巴列维 Shah Mohammed Reza Pahlavi

this_title: Der nackte König: 18 Fragmente über Revolution
trans_title: 裸体国王：18个关于革命的片段
The Naked King: 18 Fragments about Revolution
introduction: The revolution had triumphed: in January 1979, the Shah had to leave Iran. Then the ayatollah took power. In Polish August 1980, the Solidarność union formed and changed the country with their strikes. The ascent followed the decline. Andreas Hoessli was a research fellow in Poland at that time. He met the reporter legend Ryszard Kapuściński. Because of his contacts he was also under surveillance by the Polish secret service. Forty years later, he returns to Poland and in turn questions the agents of the secret service. He travels to Iran and interviews contemporary witnesses of the revolution and later generations.
chinese_title: 裸体国王：18个关于革命的片段
foreign_title: Der nackte König: 18 Fragmente über Revolution
